00052 class credirmod : public cmod {
00053         protected:
00054                 static const char _id[];
00055                 static const char _conf[];
00056 
00057                 void act();
00058                 void list( std::vector<cvq::udot_info> & );
00059                 void post_read( std::vector<cvq::udot_info>::size_type & cnt,
00060                         std::vector<cvq::udot_info> &, 
00061                         std::vector<cvq::udot_info> &, 
00062                         std::vector<cvq::udot_info> & );
00063 
00064                 void post( std::vector<cvq::udot_info> &,
00065                         std::vector<cvq::udot_info>::size_type & );
00066                 
00068                 struct _cmp : public std::unary_function<const cvq::udot_info &, bool> {
00069                         std::string id;
00070                         result_type operator ()(argument_type ptr) {
00071                                 return ptr.id == id ? true : false;
00072                         }
00073                 } cmp;
00074 
00075                 void rmspace(std::string &);
00076         public:
00077                 credirmod( cenvironment & e ) : cmod(e) { modinfo=mi_conf; }
00078                 const char *id() { return _id; }
00079                 const char *name() { return ""; }
00080                 const char *menu() { return ""; }
00081                 const char *conf() { return _conf; }
00082                 char run();
00083                 virtual ~credirmod() {}
00084 };
00086 #endif
